mapper.select:
select
from ujcms_config t where t.id_ = 1
mapper.update: update ujcms_config set context_path_ = #{contextPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port_ = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, multi_domain_ = #{multiDomain,jdbcType=CHAR}, channel_url_ = #{channelUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_url_ = #{articleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_site_id_ = #{defaultSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upload_settings_ = #{uploadSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grey_settings_ = #{greySettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, security_settings_ = #{securitySettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_settings_ = #{registerSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sms_settings_ = #{smsSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_settings_ = #{emailSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_storage_settings_ = #{uploadStorageSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, html_storage_settings_ = #{htmlStorageSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_storage_settings_ = #{templateStorageSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customs_settings_ = #{customsSettings,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_config (id_, context_path_, port_, multi_domain_, channel_url_, article_url_, default_site_id_, upload_settings_, grey_settings_, security_settings_, register_settings_, sms_settings_, email_settings_, upload_storage_settings_, html_storage_settings_, template_storage_settings_, customs_settings_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contextPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{multiDomain,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{channelUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uploadSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{greySettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securitySettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadStorageSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htmlStorageSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateStorageSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customsSettings,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
